content: read carefully this pattern is for a hood not a full costume for a goose statue the pattern for this hood is also available to view for free on my blog 1 this hood works great with my tutu pattern the pattern is free on my blog at this link https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-goose-tutu/ 2 this is designed for a 23 goose statue like the one sold by miles kimball https //amzn to/3adrwsp 3 description this can be made in any length on the neck or attached to a dress materials yarn 100 yards ww brown yarn small amounts of red white crochet hook h 5mm i 5 5mm supplies yarn needle for weaving in ends 2 small black buttons sewing needle black thread gauge 2 with an i hook = 7 half_double_crochet sts and 5 rounds 1 https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-goose-turkey-disguise/ 2 https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-goose-tutu/ 3 https //amzn to/3adrwsp
